data.comment: The first-half is under way at Stade du Pays de Charleroi - Charleroi kick-off to start the match.
Michael Ngadeu (Gent) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 37, Kaveh Rezaei is booked for the home team.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Goal! Osman Bukari gives Gent a 0-1 lead in Charleroi.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Gent with the kick-off.
Nurio Fortuna (Gent) has received a yellow card from Nathan Verboomen.
The away team replace Vadis Odjidja with Elisha Owusu.
In the minute 83, Lucas Ribeiro is replacing Saido Berahino for the home team.
Matisse Samoise is on a sub for Roman Bezus for Gent.
Charleroi make their second substitution with Ken Nkuba replacing Jules Van Cleemput.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
